Author: Mira_chan
Text: I think of it as a cheatcode, you fast and lose a bit of weight, then eat what you want and don't gain what you should because of this. Our bodies are just soooo weird sometimes.

Author: xsdylas
Text: Yes, same!! I imagine it's like a sudden pressure in our systems. When fasting there's just not enough waste to make a BM, but once you eat a meal, suddenly it can come out. I kind of look forward to it, ngl...
